d:namespace.name: http://www.backbase.com/2006/btl
d:namespace.d:resource: .btl-pagerBar{padding:0 5px;background-color:ThreeDFace;}.btl-pager{background-color:ThreeDFace;}.btl-pager a{color:ButtonText;text-decoration:none;}.btl-pagerButton{height:100%;}.btl-pagerButtonBorder{border-style:solid;border-width:1px;border-color:ThreeDFace;background-repeat:no-repeat;height:100%;}.btl-pagerButton-focusIndicator{display:block;padding:3px;height:100%;min-height:17px;}.btl-pagerButton-hover .btl-pagerButtonBorder{border-color:ThreeDHighlight ThreeDShadow ThreeDShadow ThreeDHighlight;}.btl-pagerButton-active .btl-pagerButtonBorder{border-color:ThreeDShadow ThreeDHighlight ThreeDHighlight ThreeDShadow;}.btl-pagerButton-First .btl-pagerButtonBorder{background-image:url(media/icons.png);background-position:2px 50%;width:20px;}.btl-pagerButton-Previous .btl-pagerButtonBorder{background-image:url(media/icons.png);background-position:-16px 50%;width:14px;}.btl-pagerButton-Next .btl-pagerButtonBorder{background-image:url(media/icons.png);background-position:-28px 50%;width:14px;}.btl-pagerButton-Last .btl-pagerButtonBorder{background-image:url(media/icons.png);background-position:-40px 50%;width:20px;}.btl-pagerButton-First .btl-disabled{background-position:-58px 50%;}.btl-pagerButton-Previous .btl-disabled{background-position:-76px 50%;}.btl-pagerButton-Next .btl-disabled{background-position:-88px 50%;}.btl-pagerButton-Last .btl-disabled{background-position:-100px 50%;}.btl-pager .btl-disabled,.btl-pager .btl-disabled *{cursor:default;}.btl-pagerNumbers{height:100%;width:100%;text-align:center;}.btl-pagerNumbers-inner{margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto;height:100%;}.btl-pagerButton.btl-pagerButton-currentNumber{font-weight:bold;}.btl-pagerJumper{height:100%;width:100%;text-align:center;}.btl-pagerJumper-label{white-space:nowrap;}.btl-pagerJumper-table{margin:auto;}.btl-pagerJumper input{text-align:center;width:2.5em;}.btl-pagerJumper .btl-label{white-space:nowrap;}.btl-pagerSeparator{height:100%;padding:6px 4px;}.btl-pagerSeparatorLine{border-width:0 1px;border-style:solid;border-color:ThreeDShadow ThreeDHighlight ThreeDHighlight ThreeDShadow;padding:0;height:100%;}.btl-pagerBar,.btl-pager,.btl-pager *{box-sizing:border-box;-moz-box-sizing:border-box;-khtml-box-sizing:border-box;}.gecko .btl-pagerButton-focusIndicator:focus{-moz-outline:1px dotted invert;-moz-outline-offset:-1px;}.opera .btl-pagerButtonBorder{min-height:17px;}
